nodes.speaker: Friendly NPC
nodes.text: Oh hello there, little mouse! Welcome to our cozy village. I don't think I've seen you around before.

choices.text: Hi! I'm new here. What is this place?

nodes.speaker: Friendly NPC
nodes.text: This is Rackwick Village! It's a quiet little place, but we like it that way. Lots of friendly folks around if you take the time to meet them.

choices.text: Sounds lovely. Thanks for the info!
Is there anything I should check out?

nodes.speaker: Friendly NPC
nodes.text: Oh that's a shame. Well, if you change your mind and decide to stay a while, don't hesitate to say hello!

nodes.speaker: Friendly NPC
nodes.text: The bakery has the best pastries in the region. And if you're looking for adventure, there are some interesting caves to the north... though I wouldn't go there alone.

nodes.speaker: Friendly NPC
nodes.text: Take care now, little one! Come back anytime you want to chat.
